attributes.action: dismiss MP's immediately without receiving pay until the next general election or a relocation bonus if they have been abusing the expenses system  for their own personal gain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's should not receive any further pay if they have been found in breach of the rules pertaining to expenses. They should be instantly dismissed instead of receiving pay until the next election. They should not receive their relocation expenses either.  The rules of law should apply equally to everyone. They should be investigated exactly as would someone being accused of benefit fraud and fined or imprisoned accordingly. Their offer to repay any identified errors in their accounts does not go far enough. The punishment of resignation on full pay does not fit the crime.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
